mapper.insert: INSERT INTO behavior_record (user_id, type_id, record_date, duration, content, image_url, distance, calories, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{typeId}, #{recordDate}, #{duration}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{distance}, #{calories}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE behavior_record SET user_id = #{userId}, type_id = #{typeId}, record_date = #{recordDate}, duration = #{duration}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, distance = #{distance}, calories = #{calories}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.select: SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id WHERE br.record_id = #{recordId}
SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id ORDER BY br.create_time DESC
SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id WHERE br.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY br.record_date DESC

SELECT br.*, bt.type_name, u.username as user_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id LEFT JOIN user u ON br.user_id = u.user_id WHERE br.record_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY br.record_date DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(duration), 0) FROM behavior_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND record_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT bt.type_name as typeName, COUNT(br.record_id) as recordCount, COALESCE(SUM(br.duration), 0) as totalDuration FROM behavior_type bt LEFT JOIN behavior_record br ON bt.type_id = br.type_id AND br.user_id = #{userId} AND br.record_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} WHERE bt.status = 1 GROUP BY bt.type_id, bt.type_name
SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id ORDER BY br.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id WHERE br.type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY br.record_date DESC
SELECT br.*, bt.type_name FROM behavior_record br LEFT JOIN behavior_type bt ON br.type_id = bt.type_id WHERE br.user_id = #{userId} AND br.type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY br.record_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO behavior_type (type_name, description, icon_url, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{typeName}, #{description}, #{iconUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
